text: Sven Alfred Teodor Jerring (born Jonsson; 8 December 1895 in Malung - 27 April 1979 in Stockholm) was a Swedish radio personality. He was active as a presenter, sports journalist and commentator for Sveriges Radio. From 1925, he was the annual Vasaloppet commentator. == References == Category:1895 births Category:1979 deaths Category:Swedish journalists Category:Swedish radio personalities
title: Sven Jerring
